skills.name: Java
skills.description: I coded in Java for five years in high school. I have written quite a number of programs in this language and am familiar with topics like recursion, data structures, like linked lists, stacks and queues, and string formatting, to name a few.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: Since the beginning of the semester here at my University, I have been coding in Python. I'm taking a class: Introduction to Python', where I'm learning the same OOP concepts, just employing a  different syntax.
